levels.name: Your Car
levels.description: The backseat of your beater. Cold, cramped, and smells like oil. But it's yours.
levels.flavor: You wake up with a steering wheel imprint on your forehead.

levels.name: Maya's Couch
levels.description: A lumpy couch above Torres Automotive. The sounds of wrenches and engines are your alarm clock.
levels.flavor: Maya leaves coffee on the counter. Never says it's for you. It always is.

levels.name: Harbor Studio
levels.description: A tiny studio near the docks. Water stains on the ceiling, but it's got a bed and a door that locks.
levels.flavor: The fog horn wakes you at 5 AM. Every. Single. Morning.

levels.name: Downtown Apartment
levels.description: Two bedrooms, a view of the neon signs, and a parking garage with space for your cars.
levels.flavor: The neon from the bar across the street paints your ceiling pink every night.

levels.name: Skyline Penthouse
levels.description: Top floor. Full city view. Private garage elevator. This is what winning looks like.
levels.flavor: You can see every district from up here. Every road you've conquered.

levels.name: Your Car (Again)
levels.description: Full circle. The backseat. The cold. But this time you know exactly what you lost.
levels.flavor: The steering wheel imprint feels familiar. Like coming home to a home you hate.

levels.name: Fresh Start Studio
levels.description: Different building, same sized room. But this time you chose it. That matters.
levels.flavor: No fog horn this time. Just quiet. Quiet is new.
